{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.14867v1", "title": "On tensor invariants of the Clebsch system", "summary": "We present some new Poisson bivectors that are invariants by the Clebsch
system flow. Symplectic integrators on their symplectic leaves exactly preserve
the corresponding Casimir functions, which have different physical meanings.
The Kahan discretization of the Clebsch system is discussed briefly.", "main_category": "nlin.SI", "categories": "nlin.SI,math-ph,math.MP", "published": "2025-04-21T05:36:19Z"}
